columns.property_type_code: The unique code for each property type.
columns.property_type_description: The descriptive name of the property type.

Ref_Property_Types.table_description: The table categorizes different types of real estate properties.

columns.feature_id: The unique identifier for each available feature.
columns.feature_type_code: The code categorizing the type of feature.
columns.feature_name: The name of the specific feature.
columns.feature_description: The detailed description of the feature.

Other_Available_Features.table_description: The table lists various features available in real estate properties.

columns.property_id: The unique identifier for each property.
columns.feature_id: The unique identifier for each property feature.
columns.property_feature_description: The description of the specific feature for the property.

Other_Property_Features.table_description: The table associates specific features with various properties.

columns.property_id: The unique identifier for each property.
columns.property_type_code: The code indicating the type of property.
columns.date_on_market: The date and time the property was listed for sale.
columns.date_sold: The date and time the property sale was completed.
columns.property_name: The name or title of the property.
columns.property_address: The physical location of the property.
columns.room_count: The total number of rooms in the property.
columns.vendor_requested_price: The initial price the vendor requests for the property.
columns.buyer_offered_price: The price offered by a potential buyer.
columns.agreed_selling_price: The final price agreed upon for the sale.
columns.apt_feature_1: The first feature specific to an apartment.
columns.apt_feature_2: The second feature specific to an apartment.
columns.apt_feature_3: The third feature specific to an apartment.
columns.fld_feature_1: The first feature specific to a field property.
columns.fld_feature_2: The second feature specific to a field property.
columns.fld_feature_3: The third feature specific to a field property.
columns.hse_feature_1: The first feature specific to a house.
columns.hse_feature_2: The second feature specific to a house.
columns.hse_feature_3: The third feature specific to a house.
columns.oth_feature_1: The first feature specific to other property types.
columns.oth_feature_2: The second feature specific to other property types.
columns.oth_feature_3: The third feature specific to other property types.
columns.shp_feature_1: The first feature specific to a shop property.
columns.shp_feature_2: The second feature specific to a shop property.
columns.shp_feature_3: The third feature specific to a shop property.

Properties.table_description: The table records details about various properties for sale.

columns.feature_type_code: The unique code for each type of feature.
columns.feature_type_name: The descriptive name of the feature type.

Ref_Feature_Types.table_description: The table categorizes available types of property features.
